textBox.richText: I have to apologize for being gone so long. It was a crazy month. Here are my personal updates: I finished the GRE (yay!), one of my cats passed away and the other is all better, and my little girl had her first birthday. Now I am focusing on this site, reading, and figuring out the PhD application process. Since I last wrote, I have updated the following pages: Links for Websites by Teachers Links for Presentations & Lectures Links for University World History & Genocide Studies Departments Links for Projects & Portfolios Links for University Professor & Course Sites Links for Outlines, Notes & Timelines I am anxious to move back into collecting research material, and once that is complete, and this site has a good, solid foundation, I’d like to add my own original curriculum. I have eight years of it, but I need to organize and convert it to a computer-friendly format. On a side note, I recently finished Adam Jones’ textbook on genocide and found it to be an incredibly useful tool and would recommend it for any undergraduate or graduate introduction.
